sentences.sentence: I wish to move up to toper positions with acquisition of more experience in the future.
sentences.translation: 我愿望未来跟着我工作教训的增添而逐渐晋升。

sentences.sentence: Goods fork sharp fork and wheel toper installation bracket design year, can protect year ship and drive wheel, it is apter to load and unload the tray too;
